英文法規名稱: Regulations on the Approval of Investment in the Operation of Foreign Flag Fishing Vessels
中文法規名稱: 投資經營非我國籍漁船許可辦法

法規內容.條文內容: These Regulations (hereinafter referred to as "the Regulations") are established pursuant to Article 4 paragraph 2 of the Ordinance to Govern Investment in the Operation of Foreign Flag Fishing Vessels (hereinafter referred as "the Ordinance").

Where a foreign flag fishing vessel operated and invested by a Taiwan national, engages in a fishery and fishing activities in sea areas beyond national jurisdiction which are under the competence of a regional fisheries management organization, the flag flown by that foreign flag fishing vessel shall be limited to a State who is a member or cooperating non-member of that fisheries organization.

A Taiwan national who intends to invest in the operation of a foreign flag fishing vessel, shall submit prior to his investment, an application together with list of investors and proof of their identifications, to the competent authority for approval.

After having been granted with the approval for the investment in the operation of a foreign flag fishing vessel, and for certain reasons the applicant decides to change the amount or proportion of investment to an amount or proportion less than that as promulgated by competent authority in accordance with Article 3 paragraph 2of the Ordinance, the applicant shall notify the competent authority in writing of the change within 3 months of from the date of change.

Prior to the promulgation of the Ordinance, any Taiwan national who has made investment in the operation of any foreign flag fishing vessel fishing in sea areas beyond national jurisdiction, shall submit a declaration together with proof of identification of investors, the documents and information as required in Article 5 paragraph 1 and their Chinese translation to the competent authority within 120 days after the date of promulgation of these regulations.
These regulations shall be effective upon promulgation.
